Nayler's blasphemies discovered, or, Several queries to him proposed with his owne answers thereunto / by a friend to the truth of Christ. Deacon, John, 17th cent.
[2], 60 p.
Printed for Simon Waterson ..., London : 1657.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Attributed to John Deacon. cf. Wing.
